recipesJson.name: Cinnamon Crunch Cereal
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
CAP Cereal 27, FA Meringue and FW Yogurt make a great cereal with milk base for you to build whatever profile you like on top of.

CAP Cinnamon Danish Swirl + TFA Graham Cracker (Clear) make a real nice cinnamon toast crunch combo.

I sweeten with 0.5% CAP Super Sweet.

Watch the Video Here:
https://youtu.be/LCOwXKOyuwU

reviews.text: WOW, I'm not into a heavy cinnamon taste so I tried this recipe ( grudgingly ). Its a nice mellow cinnamon flavor, if I close my eyes I can pretend that I am a child again and eating cereal at moms table. I can even taste the cinnamon swirls on the toasty graham pieces! All and all a really good vape, I am liking this mixer more and more with this one.
